cast.original_title: Le père Noël est une ordure
cast.overview: Two neurotics, working for a suicide hotline on the night of Christmas Eve, get caught up in a catastrophe when a pregnant woman, her abusive boyfriend, and a transvestite visit their office.
cast.title: Santa Claus Is a Stinker
cast.character: Zadko Preskovitch dit « Presko », le voisin Yougoslave

cast.overview: Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast food entrepreneur Tri- catel to save the French art of cooking. After having agreed to appear on a talk show to show his skills in naming food and wine by taste, he is confronted with two disasters: his son wants to become a clown rather than a restaurant tester and he, the famous Charles Duchemin, has lost his taste!
cast.title: The Wing or the Thigh?

cast.overview: In this sequel to Les Bronzes (1978) summer has passed, but that doesn't mean the fun has to end for Bernard, Nathalie, Gigi, Jerome, Popeye, Jean-Claude, and Christiane.
cast.title: French Fried Vacation 2

crew.overview: In this sequel to Les Bronzes (1978) summer has passed, but that doesn't mean the fun has to end for Bernard, Nathalie, Gigi, Jerome, Popeye, Jean-Claude, and Christiane.
crew.title: French Fried Vacation 2

details.biography:
Bruno Moynot (born 20 December 1950, in Bois-Colombes, Hauts-de-Seine, France ) is a French actor and theatre director.

Part of the famous French comedy group Le Splendid, he is best known for his roles in Patrice Leconte's Les Bronzés and its sequels, and as Zedko Preskovitch in Le Père Noël est une ordure.

He is actually the owner of Le Splendid and the Théâtre de la Renaissance with Christian Spillemaecker.

Source: Article "Bruno Moynot" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Bruno Moynot
